cui_name: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck
reasoning: Cutaneous SCC of head/neck region represents majority of cutaneous SCC cases. Global incidence ~18 per 100k, highest in fair-skinned, UV-exposed populations.
source: Alam M et al. (2001). SCC of skin and variants. J Am Acad Dermatol. 45(6):949-971
